name: Plane Simulator (DCoolMan)
description:
Search the mountaintops for five targets and shoot them down with your limited ammunition of rockets! But be careful, one hit to the ground and your plane will crash!

Use the arrow keys to move the plane around the scene. Left/Right make the plane turn that direction. Up/down makes the Tail go in that direction (Vertical input is reversed).  Use the Space Bar to shoot your limited 10 rockets at the 5 targets. The 'escape' key will pause the game for you.

This was my first try for something similar to a game, as I am just beginning as a programmer, so I would love some feedback on Game Play and UI if possible. Thanks!

P.S. Sorry there is no HTML build, it was having unfixable errors.
